```{r}
library(tidyverse)
database <- read_csv("familiar_music_database.csv", col_names = TRUE)
```

```{r}
summary(database)

ggplot(data = database, aes(x = year, y = danceability)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()

ggplot(data = database, aes(x = year, y = energy)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() 

ggplot(data = database, aes(x = year, y = liveness)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() 
```
